itunes:title: #133: Finding Your Voice in Your Recovery Journey
title: #133: Finding Your Voice in Your Recovery Journey
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: As you're recovering, it takes so much work and inner reflection to find your voice and what's true for YOU and the relationships you want to cultivate. In today's episode, we talk with our amazing student Shandalla about the journey she has taken to...
itunes:summary:
As you're recovering, it takes so much work and inner reflection to find your voice and what's true for YOU and the relationships you want to cultivate.

In today's episode, we talk with our amazing student Shandalla about the journey she has taken to find her voice and the lessons learned along the way.

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Enroll in our Coaching Signature Program for single and partnered women: From Addicted & Avoidant to Available
  • Come to our next Healed and Loved Woman Retreat


CONNECT WITH US ELSEWHERE
Website: Blackgirlsheal.org
Instagram: @BlackGirlsHeal
TikTok: @blackgirlsheal
Facebook: Black Girls Heal
Website: Blackgirlsheal.org
